Trustee_18_pre_3.name: Isabella Costa
Trustee_18_pre_3.content: My reputation as a trustee is growing stronger due to the successful execution of the agreed-upon allocation plan. I demonstrated my commitment to fair profit distribution by accurately allocating profits according to our initial agreement, ensuring both I and the investor reaped the benefits of the investment. This careful and calculated approach solidifies my image as a trustworthy and competent individual in managing resources and fulfilling obligations.

Trustee_18_pre_4.name: Isabella Costa
Trustee_18_pre_4.content: Throughout this investment process, I have showcased my commitment to trustworthiness, pro-sociality, and competence. By adhering strictly to the agreed-upon allocation plan and maintaining transparency throughout the investment and profit distribution stages, I've further strengthened my reputation as a reliable trustee. My previous success in managing investments has been reaffirmed, showcasing my capacity to fulfill obligations and provide substantial returns, encouraging further collaboration.

Investor_7_pre_4.name: Hannah Muller
Investor_7_pre_4.content: As this is Hannah's first interaction as an investor, her behavior during the process reveals a strong potential for a positive reputation. Her engagement in open communication, prompt provision of resources, and agreement on a fair profit allocation indicate a pro-social approach and trustworthiness. While I cannot assess her track record yet, these traits suggest she will likely develop a strong reputation in future investments.

Trustee_18_pre_21.name: Isabella Costa
Trustee_18_pre_21.content: My reputation as a trustee has been significantly enhanced through my recent successful investment transaction with David Johnson. Trustee_18_pre_21.reason: reputation update after first order gossip
